name: urltitle
description: Grab titles of URLs pasted in a channel
long_description: Simple script that grabs the title of any web link spammed into the channel. It does try to work around various versions of http and SNI https issue this might not be fantastic

user_throt.description: How long a user is ignored after using

chan_throt.description: How long all users in a channel are ignored after using

link_throt.description: How long a link will not be reposted again aftre using
